title: From around 10 onward, my Pixel 3a XL doesn't reload & refresh my FB & IG apps but wifi is working.
content: I tried to check with my connectivity setting on data limitation. But it shows as not a problem. All my other devices are working normally. Also, I tried using my cellular data instead. Out does work. Except using WiFi connection. The problem only on this device.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
